headline.main: SICILIANS WELCOMED 6 DOWNED U.S. FLIERS; Farmers Took Care of Injured Men and Derided Mussolini

lead_paragraph: JERUSALEM, Aug. 1 -- Six American airmen whose bomber had been shot down in mid-July by a night fighter near Ragusa, Sicily, received a remarkable welcome from Italian civilians, according to a story told at their rest camp somewhere in Palestine, where they have been recuperating.
abstract: 6 US airmen shot down near Ragusa, Sicily, rept Ital farmers helped them
snippet: JERUSALEM, Aug. 1 -- Six American airmen whose bomber had been shot down in mid-July by a night fighter near Ragusa, Sicily, received a remarkable welcome from Italian civilians, according to a story told at their rest camp somewhere in Palestine,...

byline.original: By Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
